SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS num, qna_idx, question, content, ref, view_count, create_user, parent_qna_idx, DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as create_date, del_chk, (select auth_type from `user` where user_id = create_user ) as auth_type FROM daul.daul_qna, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE del_chk = 'N'
AND question like concat('%',#{search},'%')
AND content like concat('%',#{search},'%')
AND create_user like concat('%',#{search},'%')
AND create_date >= date_format(concat(#{search_s_date}, ' 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND create_date <= date_format(concat(#{search_e_date}, ' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
ORDER BY ref ASC, indent DESC ) sub ORDER BY sub.num DESC LIMIT #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
